content: Just a general question (I don't have a specific PR in mind): is it OK to reassign a PR to myself if the original reviewer didn't reply for some time? Or is it considered impolite? Anything I should look out for?

@Lukas Kalbertodt You can read about the triage procedure that the release team does for PRs. Forge should cover that under the S-waiting-for-review section. https://forge.rust-lang.org/release/triage-procedure.html
Thanks! I guess I should read the full forge docs before asking more questions ^_^
@Lukas Kalbertodt it's a great idea to r? yourself if you can review it and the reviewer hasn't reviewed it for some time
you can also eagerly review-steal things if you don't think there's any controversy in doing so
(and even if it's just opened, too)
especially if it was assigned by rust-highfive, there's going to be no controversy at all
